patterns: what you can brief me on
What features does Mega Cloud offer?
responses:
Mega Cloud provides personalized, omnichannel customer support from a single interface through our cloud-based contact center solution. Some of the attractive features of Mega Cloud are:
1. Omnichannel Management
2. Future-Proofed Contact Center
3.Chatbots with Text-to-Speech Capabilties
4.Workforce Management Integration
5.Built-In AI Routing Two-Way Messaging

patterns: Tell me more about Omni Channel Management
I want to know more about Omnichannel Management
responses: Through Omnichannel Management, connect any and all customer communication channels you need at any time, providing a seamless customer journey regardless of how they choose to contact your business.

patterns: Tell me more about Omni Channel advantages
how exactly would this benefit me
I want to know more about Omnichannel Management
responses: Through Omnichannel Management, connect any and all customer communication channels you need at any time, providing a seamless customer journey regardless of how they choose to contact your business.

patterns: Tell me more about Future-Proofed Contact Center
I want to know more about Future-Proofed Contact Center
responses: Future-Proofed Contact Center feature allows you to create and modify channels easily, always having complete ownership of your customer interaction data across all channels.

patterns: Tell me more about Chatbots with Text-to-Speech Capabilties
I want to know more about Chatbots with Text-to-Speech Capabilties
What is Chatbots with Text-to-Speech Capabilties
responses: Advanced AI-based chatbots enable you to automatically respond to basic inquiries, allowing agents to focus on more complex inquiries and for you to fielda higher volume of calls and chats.

patterns: Tell me more about Workforce Management Integration
I want to know more about Workforce Management Integration
responses: Use Workforce Management Integration feature to optimize existing contact center and platforms like workforce management software and third party planning and operations tools.

patterns: Tell me more about Built-In AI Routing
I want to know more about Built-In AI Routing
responses: With Built-In AI Routing feature, choose to turn on our complimentary AI routing soolution at any time to match your customers with agents with compatible behavioral characteristics, driving measurably better outcomes.

patterns: I want to know more about Two Way Messaging
responses: Through Two-Way Messaging feature, increase responsiveness by easily sending and respoonding to customer inquiries.

patterns: What are the agent desktop features?
responses:
A few of many agent deskop features are:
1. See te full picture with contextual details about customer history and preferences
2. Manage all conversations in one streamlined interface. Field inbound messages or place outbound calls using a personalized directory
3. View and track individual agent performance metrics like AHT, FCR, and more

patterns: What Mega Cloud packages are available?
responses:
Mega Cloud is available in three flavors at a variety of affordable price points.
1. Free - $0/mo
2. Premium - $99/mo
3. Platinum - $170/mo
